About Us

The diverse and rich experience of the framework and place of training provides a wide range of (specialists) participation in the formation of new proposals. Everyday practice shows that the scope and place of staff training allows us to assess the significance of further development directions.

Thus, the constant quantitative growth and scope of our activity is an interesting experiment in testing the essential financial and administrative conditions.
